scripts.deploy:localhost: yarn run deploy:registry --network localhost && yarn run deploy:tokenTransferProxy --network localhost && yarn run deploy:exchange --network localhost && yarn run deploy:exchangeWrap --network localhost && yarn run deploy:atomicizer --network localhost && yarn run config --network localhost
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run deploy:registry --network goerli && yarn run deploy:tokenTransferProxy --network goerli && yarn run deploy:exchange --network goerli && yarn run deploy:exchangeWrap --network goerli && yarn run config --network goerli && yarn run deploy:atomicizer --network goerli
scripts.deploy:bsctest: yarn run deploy:registry --network bsctest && yarn run deploy:tokenTransferProxy --network bsctest && yarn run deploy:exchange --network bsctest && yarn run deploy:exchangeWrap --network bsctest && yarn run config --network bsctest
scripts.env:localhost: rm -rf ./localhost.deployed.json && yarn run compile && yarn run deploy:mock --network localhost && yarn run deploy:localhost && yarn run test:fixture --network localhost
scripts.env:goerli: rm -rf ./goerli.deployed.json && yarn run compile && yarn run deploy:goerli
